::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, sf)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, sf, ggstatsplot, tmap)
```
:::


ESRI Shapefile of Master Plan 2014 Subzone Boundary Web data.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz14_shp <- st_read(dsn = "data/MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundaryWebSHP", layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `C:\EasonXu-HY99\IS415\In-class_Ex\In-class_Ex02\data\MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundaryWebSHP' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
class(mpsz14_shp)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "sf"         "data.frame"
```


:::
:::


KML file of Master Plan 2014 Subzone Boundary Web data.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz14_kml <- st_read("data/MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundaryWebKML.kml")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
st_write(mpsz14_shp, "data/MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL.kml", delete_dsn = TRUE)
```
:::


"delete_dsn" is to avoid the errors that the same name file exists in the same location.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz19_shp <- st_read(dsn = "data/MPSZ-2019", layer = "MPSZ-2019")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

```


```
z_range:       zmin: 0 zmax: 0
```

:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz19_shp <- st_read(dsn = "data/MPSZ-2019", layer = "MPSZ-2019") %>%
  st_transform(crs = 3414)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MPSZ-2019' from data source 
  `C:\EasonXu-HY99\IS415\In-class_Ex\In-class_Ex02\data\MPSZ-2019' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'

```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata <- read_csv("data/respopagesextod2023.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 100928 Columns: 7
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (5): PA, SZ, AG, Sex, TOD
dbl (2): Pop, Time

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata2023 <- popdata %>%
  group_by(PA, SZ, AG) %>%
  summarise(`POP` = sum(`Pop`)) %>%  
  ungroup() %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = AG, values_from = POP)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'PA', 'SZ'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
colnames(popdata2023)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1] "PA"          "SZ"          "0_to_4"      "10_to_14"    "15_to_19"   
 [6] "20_to_24"    "25_to_29"    "30_to_34"    "35_to_39"    "40_to_44"   
[11] "45_to_49"    "50_to_54"    "55_to_59"    "5_to_9"      "60_to_64"   
[16] "65_to_69"    "70_to_74"    "75_to_79"    "80_to_84"    "85_to_89"   
[21] "90_and_Over"
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata2023 <- popdata2023 %>%
  mutate_at(.vars = vars(PA, SZ), .funs = list(toupper))  
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pop2023_mpsz <- left_join(popdata2023, mpsz19_shp, by = c("SZ" = "SUBZONE_N"))
```
:::
